title: Evaluation and Utilization Strategy Education for Online Help Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer operation skills and intermediate-level language domain comprehension
context.additional_context: As general citizens, learners aim to strengthen problem-solving competencies using digital tools and undertake projects to evaluate and improve the usability of language-domain software

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply over 80% of usability evaluation criteria for online help systems
Learners can analyze and report software help documentation strengths and improvement areas at 100% accuracy using evaluation checklists
Learners can integrate help system improvement plans into PBL projects at 90% implementation fidelity based on evaluation results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
